New.title: New Topic
New.description: Create a topic to share with the community

hints.0: ‚ú® Discovered something new? Share it with everyone.
hints.1: üí° Stuck on a problem? Start a discussion.

title.min: Title must be at least 5 characters
title.max: Title must be at most 100 characters

content.min: Content must be at least 20 characters
content.max: Content must be at most 5000 characters

tag.maxLength: A tag must be at most 15 characters

rewardPoints.positive: Reward points must be greater than 0
rewardPoints.exceedBalance: Reward points cannot exceed your available credits

pollOptions.min: At least 2 poll options are required
pollOptions.optionMaxLength: Option text must be at most 256 characters

lotteryEndTime.future: Lottery end time must be in the future

lotteryRules.min: Participation rules must be at least 10 characters
lotteryRules.max: Participation rules must be at most 500 characters

winnerCount.positive: Winner count must be greater than 0
winnerCount.max: Winner count must be between 1 and 100

pollEndTime.future: Poll end time must be in the future

pollConfig.maxChoices: Max choices must be greater than 1 and not exceed the number of options

lottery.endTimeFuture: End time must be in the future
lottery.floorInterval: Floor interval must be a positive number
lottery.participantThreshold: Participant threshold must be a positive number
lottery.winnerCount: Winner count must be between 1 and 100
lottery.fixedFloors: Floor numbers must be greater than 1

bounty.totalPositive: Bounty total must be a positive number
bounty.slotsMin: Bounty slots must be at least 2 for multiple mode
bounty.singleAmountPositive: Single amount must be a positive number

description.question: Ask a question and wait for the best answer
description.poll: Create a poll to collect opinions

form.confirmMessage: You will deduct {amount} credits as bounty, confirm to publish?
form.insufficientWarning: Insufficient credits, please top up or adjust the bounty amount

action.confirmMessage: You will reward {amount} credits to {user}'s reply. Continue?

info.title: Bounty Info
info.noRewardsYet: No rewards yet, be the first to answer!

success.created: Bounty topic published successfully, {amount} credits deducted

validation.totalPositive: Bounty amount must be greater than 0
validation.slotsSingle: Bounty slots must be 1 for single mode
validation.slotsMultiple: Bounty slots must be greater than 1 for multiple mode
validation.singleAmountRequired: Single amount is required for multiple mode
validation.totalMismatch: Bounty total must equal single amount √ó slots

lotteryRules.placeholder: Describe participation conditions and lottery rules

winnerCount.info: Number of winners to randomly select (1-100)

Branding.description: A next-generation community platform built with cutting-edge technology for meaningful conversations.

error.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

verification.subject: Registration Verification Code
verification.textBody: Your registration verification code is: {code}, valid for {minutes} minutes.

error.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.passwordMax: Password must be at most 72 characters
error.usernameMin: Username must be at least {min} characters
error.usernameMax: Username must be at most {max} characters
error.usernameFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, Chinese characters, and hyphens
error.usernameInvalid: Username contains invalid characters or format
error.codeInvalidOrExpired: Email code is invalid or expired
error.registrationFailed: Registration failed, please try again later
error.registrationNotEnabled: Registration is currently closed, please contact administrator
error.sendTooFrequent: Sending too frequently, please try again later
error.inviteCodeMaxUsed: Invite code has reached maximum uses

PasswordReset.title: Reset Password
PasswordReset.description: Enter your new password to complete the reset.
PasswordReset.success: Password reset successful. Please sign in with your new password.
PasswordReset.invalidToken: Reset link is invalid or expired. Please request a new password reset.
PasswordReset.noToken: Missing reset token, redirecting to sign in...

email.subject: Password Reset
email.textBody:
You are resetting your password. Please click the link below to proceed: {link}

This link expires in {minutes} minutes. If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.
email.htmlLine1: You are resetting your password. Please click the link below to proceed:
email.htmlLine2: This link expires in {minutes} minutes. If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

error.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.passwordMax: Password must be at most 72 characters
error.tokenInvalid: Reset link is invalid or expired
error.resetFailed: Password reset failed, please try again
error.sendFailed: Failed to send reset email, please try again
error.sendTooFrequent: Sending too frequently, please try again later
error.noEmail: Your account has no email address, cannot send reset email
error.passwordWeak: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password (avoid common passwords, sequential numbers or letters)

AdminOverview.title: Admin Overview
AdminOverview.description: Real-time data and community trend monitoring

map.title: Global Activity
map.description:
Visualizing global user presence and interaction hotspots.
This real-time map tracks member activity across continents, providing immediate insights into community growth and geographic engagement trends.

header.title: Operation Insights
header.description: Monitor core community metrics, user activity, and system health with real-time data and historical trends for deeper community insights.

categoryTrends.title: Category Topic Distribution (30d)
categoryTrends.description: Daily new topics in popular categories

tagTrends.title: Tag Usage Trend (30d)
tagTrends.description: Daily new topics with popular tags

badges.title: Badge Award Records
badges.description: Community achievement and honor distribution activity

registrations.title: Recent Registrations
registrations.description: New members recently joined the community

logins.title: Recent Logins
logins.description: Monitor user login activities in real-time

AdminUsers.title: User Management
AdminUsers.description: Manage all users in the system, including role assignment and status management

badgeDialog.title: Manage User Badges
badgeDialog.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one badge

AdminDonations.title: Donation Management
AdminDonations.description: Manage and view all donation records, track donation statistics

actions.confirmMessage: Confirm this donation has been received?
actions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this donation record? This action cannot be undone.

AdminCategories.title: Category Management
AdminCategories.description: Manage forum categories including create, edit, sort, etc.

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete Category
deleteConfirm.description: This will soft delete the category. Related topics will not be affected. You can view and restore it through filters.

AdminTags.title: Tag Management
AdminTags.description: Manage forum tags including create, edit, sort, etc.

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete Tag
deleteConfirm.description: This will soft delete the tag. Related topics will not be affected. You can view and restore it through filters.

AdminTopics.title: Topic Management
AdminTopics.description: Manage all forum topics including edit, pin, delete, etc.

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.description: This will soft delete the topic. The topic will not be displayed on the front page, but can be restored. Are you sure to continue?

restoreConfirm.title: Confirm Restore
restoreConfirm.description: This will restore the deleted topic. The topic will be displayed on the front page again. Are you sure to continue?

AdminBadges.title: Badge Management
AdminBadges.description: Manage forum badge system, create and configure achievement badges

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete Badge
deleteConfirm.description: This operation will soft delete the badge, data will still be retained. Continue?

name.label: Forum Name
name.description: Displayed in website title, header, etc.

welcome_message.label: Homepage Welcome Message
welcome_message.description: Custom homepage title, leave empty to use default multilingual title

enabled.label: Allow Registration
enabled.description: Global switch to control whether new user registration is allowed

email_verify.label: Email Verification
email_verify.description: Whether email verification is required after registration

require_invite_code.label: Invite Code Registration
require_invite_code.description: When enabled, new users must provide a valid invite code to register

publish_permission.label: Topic Publish Permission
publish_permission.description: Control which users can publish topics (all/verified/admin)

reply_permission.label: Reply Permission
reply_permission.description: Control which users can reply to posts (all/verified/admin)

enabled.label: Sensitive Word Filter
enabled.description: Whether to enable sensitive word filtering

page_size.label: Page Size
page_size.description: Number of items per page in lists

enabled.label: Maintenance Mode
enabled.description: Whether to enable website maintenance mode

enabled_locales.label: Enabled Translation Languages
enabled_locales.description: Select target languages for automatic translation tasks, multiple selection supported

host.label: SMTP Host
host.description: SMTP server hostname or IP address

secure.label: Use TLS/SSL
secure.description: Whether to enable TLS/SSL encrypted connection

from_email.label: From Email
from_email.description: Sender email address shown in emails
